mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "secKill.seckillId", s.name "secKill.name", s.number "secKill.number", s.start_time "secKill.startTime", s.end_time "secKill.endTime", s.create_time "secKill.createTime" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and user_phone=#{userPhone}
